document_data.name: Fer 'e's a Jolly Good Fellow
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fer 'e's a Jolly Good Fellow''''' was rowdy sea shanty from the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents:
{{quote|''Fer 'e's a jolly good fellow,
Fer e's a jolly good fellow,
Fer 'e's a jolly good felloooow...
Dat nobody can deny!
Dat nobody can deny!
Dat nobody can deny!
Ooohhh...''|Pirate Paul}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''Fer 'e's a Jolly Good Fellow'' was sang at the [[Vulgar Monkey]], a dockside tavern on the island of [[Brynnlaw]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]]. The shanty was a favorite of [[Paul (pirate)|Pirate Paul's]].
